name: Bones for the Pumpkin God
description:
A Halloween themed arcade shooter where you must collect all of the bones in the level to appease the Pumpkin God. But watch out for the ghosts.....

This is an arcade style game so the goal is the get the highest amount of bones possible before losing all of your lives.

Controls:

  • Move: W, A, S, D
  • Aim: Mouse
  • Shoot: Left mouse button
